column5: How thick is the ice on LOTW now? February 28th it was 42 inches. Is it getting thinner or thicker? Thanks Alan
Talked to a guide yesterday. Depending on where you are at it is 45-50 inches thick.
We have a place at Lake Of The Woods and we were there the last two weekends. I use a StrikeMaster Lazer Mag and I was just breaking through without an extension.
